title: Project ideas for capstone
content:
Recommend some project ideas for capstone project under ML 
Can be big data, NLP, computer vision, Deep learning or a crossover

comments.body: This is not the right place for this. Use PESU Discord.

Also ideas are something they should come up with and not look for suggestions online - this isn't a project, it's a thesis. If you're not passionate or curious enough about solving a problem in any field such that you borrow ideas online, how are you going to carry out 2 years of research on this?

what if the professors in-charge dont like it? from what I have heard, people just choose some project they dont like but the guide forces them to take it up. 

If I have a good idea and I show them a good prototype of whatever I am working towards at the time of choosing teams and ideas, wont the chances of it being selected be higher?

Being in AIML dept, is it compulsory to choose your thesis in field of AI?
